South Africa's outgoing #PublicProtector #ThuliMadonsela to question Jacob Zuma on allegations of #StateCapture
#StateCapture, as is happening in South Africa, denotes holding the state to ransom. What are the implications?
Lobbying to achieve particular outcomes is acceptable in a democracy. But #StateCapture is different

citation.abstract: Lobbying political actors to achieve particular outcomes is an acceptable practice in a democracy. But state capture, as is allegedly happening in South Africa, denotes holding the state to ransom.
citation.title: Why state capture is a regressive step for any society

facebook.title: Why state capture is a regressive step for any society
facebook.summary: Lobbying political actors to achieve particular outcomes is an acceptable practice in a democracy. But state capture, as is allegedly happening in South Africa, denotes holding the state to ransom. The country's president, Jacob Zuma, is to be interviewed
